Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Allows corporations to conduct business and meetings electronically for a certain period of time
Summary: Allows corporations to conduct business and meetings electronically either for the duration of the state disaster emergency or until December 31, 2021, whichever is later.
LawCode: Amd §§708 & 602, BC L; amd §§603 & 605, N-PC L; amd §28, Rel Corp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the business corporation law, the not-for-profit corporation law and the religious corporations law, in relation to allowing corporations to conduct business and meetings electronically for a certain period of time
